channel.title: Linux on Chuck
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on Chuck

item.title: Install WSL Debian
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: 官方的WSL分发版中，Debian的版本已经更新到13（代号trixie），大量的软件包得到了更新，可以长期稳定使用。

item.title: Ubuntu Phased Updates
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: Phased updates are software updates that are gradually rolled out to users rather than all users getting the updates at the same time.

item.title: Install WSL From Image
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: You do not need access to the Microsoft Store to use this installation method and the images can be self-hosted on an internal network.

item.title: Delete Git Submodule
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: A few steps to delete git submodule totally.

item.title: WSL import and export
item.author: chuckxcp@qq.com (Chuck)
item.description: Export a distribution and import it to another disk.
